articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: ‘Virtually’ all Voice of America staff put on leave after Trump order - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Reporters Without Borders slammed the decision, saying it “threatens press freedom worldwide”.
articles.content:
Nearly all Voice of America (VOA) staff members have been placed on leave after United States President Donald Trump signed an executive order gutting the government-run news agency.
On Friday night… [+2877 chars]
